first_encounter: ^As you leave the village, you encounter a young boy, no more than nine years old, sitting along the dirt road that leads in and out.
^You greet the boy and note the thirst that tightens his mouth and the way his shirt fits too loosely on his torso.
^"Please, big sister, do you have any water to spare?"
^Give the boy a drink from the jug and an apple from your bag?

c-0: ^You hold out the jug of water so the boy can have his fill.
^"Here, child. Once you are done, go into the village and look for the chief. Tell him his daughter has sent you and he will feed and clothe you."
^[You watch the boy head to the village and continue along the path]
c-1: ^You continue on your way, determined to not be sidetracked again.
